Contents: @FreeJAC @Puertorock77_ @Nintendad_ Remote play and psnow are two different things aimed at two different customers. One wants to own the console and games and wants to stream for free. The other doesn't want to buy the console or games and will pay a fee to stream. Comparing the two is a reach.
Author: @DannyStabb
Name: Danny staBB
Post Title:
@FreeJAC @Puertorock77_ @Nintendad_ Remote play and psnow are two different things aimed at two different customers.

One wants to own the console and games and wants to stream for free.

The other doesn't want to buy the console or games and will pay a fee to stream.

Comparing the two is a reach.

Contents: @dan_kach22 This happens when you attempt to log in to a consoles' profile that has a different PSN account signed in and linked to that local user. Because each PSN can only be associated with only one user, to fix this you will need to find the correct local user or create a new user.

Name: Ask PlayStation
Post Title: @dan_kach22 This happens when you attempt to log in to a consoles' profile that has a different PSN account signed in and linked to that local user. Because each PSN can only be associated with only one user, to fix this you will need to find the correct local user or create a new user.

Contents: The worst deal you can make for yourself as a Xbox owner is to pay a monthly Xbox Live subscription on top of GamePass. The worst deal you can make for yourself as a PS4 owner is to pay the monthly PSNow subscription. Go Annual Xbox Live + GamePass. Go annual PSNow.
Author: @Begaria
Name: Begaria
Post Title:
The worst deal you can make for yourself as a Xbox owner is to pay a monthly Xbox Live subscription on top of GamePass.  The worst deal you can make for yourself as a PS4 owner is to pay the monthly PSNow subscription.

Go Annual Xbox Live + GamePass.

Go annual PSNow.

Contents: @zSteffzeh If you want to swap data between two consoles, but want to swap the HDD's, why not put the intended HDD into the recipient console and then transfer the data? If the HDD you want to use is already in use on the old console, make a backup, then restore it on new one ^DB

Contents: @NeilNutbeam Hello! If its switching itself on at random, it will likely be a faulty power switch, or perhaps a faulty controller bringing it out of its powered down state. Have you tried desyncing the controller from the console and checking if this behaviour continues? ^DB
Author: @AskPS_UK
Name: Ask PlayStation UK
Post Title: @NeilNutbeam Hello! If its switching itself on at random, it will likely be a faulty power switch, or perhaps a faulty controller bringing it out of its powered down state. Have you tried desyncing the controller from the console and checking if this behaviour continues? ^DB

Author: @PlayStationEU
Name: PlayStation Europe
Post Title:
